title: Producing Black Document
description: Connects building healthy Black communities and Black economic empowerment within the framework of contemporary documentary filmmaking. Students will write, produce, edit, and distribute a mini-documentary.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ENGL 1102 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and LMC 3406 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
